mapper.insert: insert into POINT(point_id, point_no, point_type, point_owner, point_amount, point_contents, point_chg_date) values ('point'||point_id_seq.nextval, point_no_seq.nextval, #{point_type}, #{point_owner}, #{point_amount}, #{point_contents}, sysdate)

insert into POINT(point_id, point_no, point_type, point_owner, point_amount, point_contents, point_chg_date) values ('point'||point_id_seq.nextval, point_id_seq.nextval, #{point_type}, #{point_owner}, -1*#{point_amount}, #{point_contents}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT p.point_chg_date, m.real_name, p.point_contents, p.point_amount, p.point_balance FROM POINT p, MEMBER m WHERE p.point_owner = m.member_no and p.point_owner = #{point_onwer}

select * from (select rownum rn, point_id, point_type, point_amount, point_contents, point_chg_date, point_balance from (select * from point order by lpad(point_id, 10, '0') desc) where rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount}) where rn > (#{pageNum} -1) * #{amount}
select userpw from MEMBER where member_no = ${member_no};
